title: embracing bus Schedule
description: Create a program that asks the user for the current time and then prints out the schedule for the next bus based on the following rules: If the current time is between 7:00 and 9:00, the next bus is in 15 minutes; if the current time is between 9:00 and 16:00, the next bus is in 30 minutes; if the current time is between 16:00 and 18:00, the next bus is in 15 minutes; if the current time is after 18:00, there are no more buses
sample_output: The next bus is in 30 minutes
